notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected damage and destruction at Sana'a International Airport, Sana'a Governorate, Yemen. Using satellite imagery acquired 15 May 2015 and 12 December 2014, UNITAR-UNOSAT identified a total of 70 affected structures and transportation vehicles. Approximately 18 of these were destroyed, 32 severely damaged, and 20 moderately damaged. Additionally, 32 impact craters were found. One medical facility was identified within 500 meters of impact craters. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR-UNOSAT.
